description: The owner of Tyrol, a local bakery which http://anidb.net/ch4560 [Yumi] (and in the manga, http://anidb.net/ch4554 [Hideki]) once worked in and which http://anidb.net/ch2165 [Chii] ends up working at. He is thirty-nine years old, although he looks as though he is only in his mid-20`s, at one point noting jokingly that he has a "baby face".
name: Ueda Hiroyasu
